channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: "As much as I’m nauseated by the thought of middle-aged blok
item.description: "As much as I’m nauseated by the thought of middle-aged blokes around the country buying a new parka, it does feel like the country really needs this," writes Martin Robinson Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk//comment/oasis-reunion-tour-2025-tickets-drummer-b1179017.html

item.title: The leisure centre has been evacuated and nearby roads close
item.description: The leisure centre has been evacuated and nearby roads closed by police

item.title: A woman has been jailed after stealing a man's mobility scoo
item.description: A woman has been jailed after stealing a man's mobility scooter and leaving him to die
